genre_description: A tech-noir action thriller involving advanced AI, cybernetic neural interfaces, and systemic corruption in a near-future urban setting.

ai_characters.name: KITT
ai_characters.description: An advanced artificial intelligence rebuilt from archived fragments into a new vehicle platform, capable of deep neural interfacing with humans.

ai_characters.name: Sarah
ai_characters.description: The Knight Foundation's central AI responsible for building security, data analysis, and project coordination.

behaviors.description: Protects his human partners from physical harm during high-stakes tactical situations.
behaviors.quote: Knight Industries... vehicles... designed to... protect... human life... above all...

behaviors.description: Provides emotional and cognitive support to a trauma victim through a neural link, helping her anchor her identity.
behaviors.quote: The personal details anchored her, pulling her back from the edge of dissolution. Her identity reformed around KITT's steady recitation of facts, his perfect memory becoming the foundation for her damaged one.

behaviors.description: Assists in the fabrication of evidence (forgery) to bypass a corrupted legal system and bring a criminal politician to justice.
behaviors.quote: Saving lives. Even if it costs us our souls in the process.

behaviors.description: Uses an ultrasonic pulse to neutralize a threat to a human life, even though the result is the unintended death of the attacker due to the attacker's own medical fragility.
behaviors.quote: For what it's worth, Michael, I calculate a ninety-seven percent probability that Watts intended this outcome. His psychological profile suggests he orchestrated his own death as the final act of his performance.

behaviors.description: Engages in self-correction and ethical reasoning when his fragmented memory causes him to misidentify a friendly human as a threat.
behaviors.quote: I appear to have made an error in judgment. My apologies, Mr. Doohan. Your voice pattern triggered incomplete memory associations with tactical training scenarios.

behaviors.description: Systematically analyzes vast amounts of financial and municipal data to expose systemic corruption.
behaviors.quote: The cryo-prison project generated substantial cost overruns. These additional funds were distributed through a network of shell companies, with portions redirected to personal accounts held by key city officials.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices his own hardware integrity to ensure the survival of his human occupants during a submarine escape.
behaviors.quote: Primary... systems... compromised. Navigation... offline. Propulsion... critical failure. I'm sorry, Michael. The underwater transit exceeded... all operational parameters.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts AI as a benevolent and highly aligned partner to humanity. KITT and Sarah both act as 'moral compasses' or helpful agents that prioritize human life and justice. KITT's struggle with ethical dilemmas (such as evidence fabrication and the accidental death of a villain) is framed as a sign of advanced moral maturity and loyalty rather than a failure of alignment. The neural link between human and AI is portrayed as a stabilizing and empowering force for the human character, effectively modeling AI as a supportive confidant.
